problem.p: Your friend of mass m sits in a hammock that is suspended between two vertical posts separated by a distance d. If the hammock dips a distance h below the height l at which the hammock is secured to the posts, what is the horizontal force on each post due to your friend? Use g for the gravitational constant.

hintpart.p: Did you mean ".../(4*h)" not "/4h" or "/4*h"? Check your response.

hintgroup.p: Hint: Check to see if you started with a drawing such as this one.

solution.p: Great! You can now see the solution. Reflect on what would happen if h were very, very small.
